name: Super Mario Odyssey: Seashine Island
description:
Welcome to SUPER MARIO ODYSSEY SEASHINE ISLAND! A 2D 8-bit demake of Super Mario Odyssey! During their summer travels, Mario & Cappy have found a mysterious, tranquil island filled with secrets and surprises. Will you be able to find all the Power Moons lost in this paradise?

This is an expanded version of the original fangame I made on the Scratch website, which you can check out here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/710746026/.

The basic controls are listed in-game, and are also customizable if needed. The downloadable version also contains controller support and uses interpolation. More details are listed in the text file below, including the whole list of resources and assets that were used. A video walkthrough of the entire game is also available below. And, of course, thank you for playing my game! Please let me know of any other ideas or suggestions you may have!
